message: Bob, I'm offering you a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to acquire a product of incredible value. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial deal. My initial offer is $1500000. Let's discuss!
Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I'm interested in the product,  $1500000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $1200000. Let's see if we can reach a mutually agreeable price.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your counteroffer.  While I understand your position, $1200000 doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1350000. Let's bridge the gap and finalize this deal.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $1350000 is closer to what I'm looking for, but I'm still a bit hesitant.  I'm willing to go to $1300000. This is my best offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
